p.codeblock: public class AgoraImage { public String url; public int x; public int y; public int width; public int height; public int zOrder; }

__attribute__((visibility("default"))) @interface AgoraImage : NSObject @property(strong, nonatomic) NSURL *_Nonnull url; @property(assign, nonatomic) CGRect rect; @property (assign, nonatomic) NSInteger zOrder; @end
typedef struct RtcImage { RtcImage() : url(NULL), x(0), y(0), width(0), height(0) {} const char* url; int x; int y; int width; int height; } RtcImage;
export interface RtcImage { x: number, y: number, width: number, height: number, url: string }

section.p: This class sets the properties of the watermark and background images in the live video.

plentry.pd: The HTTP/HTTPS URL address of the image in the live video. The maximum length of this parameter is 1024 bytes.
The x coordinate (pixel) of the image on the video frame (taking the upper left corner of the video frame as the origin).
The y coordinate (pixel) of the image on the video frame (taking the upper left corner of the video frame as the origin).
The width (pixel) of the image on the video frame.
The height (pixel) of the image on the video frame.
图片在视频画面上的位置和大小，类型为 CGRect。
The layer index of the video frame. An integer. The value range is [0, 100]. 取值范围为 [1,100] 中的整型。 1 表示该区域图像位于最下层，而 100 表示该区域图像位于最上层。
